channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: What’s Next After Graduation? Explore Your Options.
item.description: Considering a coterminal or accelerated master’s degree? Join the Lally School of Management and invited RPI graduate program representatives on Wednesday, February 25 from 12:00–1:00 p.m. in PITTS 5114 to learn more about graduate programs, how coterminal pathways work, and what funding opportunities may be available. All RPI students are welcome. Pizza will be provided. Register using the link on our website.
item.author: Students

item.title: Rensselaer Dining Student Culinary Council Meeting
item.description: Join us on Wednesday, February 25th at 3:30 PM in Union Room 3418 for the upcoming Rensselaer Dining Student Culinary Council meeting!
item.author: Students

item.title: Success Center Tutoring for Chemistry I, II, and Organic
item.description: Did you know the Success Center offers small group tutoring in Chemistry I, II and Organic Chemistry SEVEN days a week! Check out our small group tutoring schedule and sign up today with our amazing peer tutors: https://rpi.mywconline.com/.
item.author: Students

item.title: Open Office Hours with Lally Dean Liad Wagman
item.description: Exploring opportunities, have an idea, or want to ask questions? Stop by Dean Wagman’s Open Office Hours on Tuesday, February 24 from 2:00–3:00 p.m. in the Pittsburgh Building, Room 3104. No appointment needed. Come with questions, ideas, or simply a desire to explore opportunities and get more involved.
item.author: Students

item.title: The Office of Graduate Education & Graduate Experience invites you to attend the Graduate Student Cultural Celebration
item.description: Date: Tuesday, February 24, 2026 5:00 PM - 8:00 PM - Join us for an eventful evening filled with engaging conversations, delectable food, lively music, and exciting games. Take this opportunity to unwind and mingle with your fellow students. REGISTRATION IS REQUIRED.
item.author: Students

item.title: MANE Spring Seminar Series with Dr. Pradeep Guduru
item.description: Date: Wednesday, February 25, 2026 10:30 AM - 11:30 AM - “Nonlinear metamaterials with engineered heterogeneities”, Dr. Pradeep Guduru, Professor, Co-Director of the Mechanics of Undersea Science and Engineering Center, School of Engineering, Brown University
item.author: Community

item.title: ECSE Mercer Lecture: “Spectrally Agile Cellular Wireless Systems”
item.description: Date: Wednesday, February 25, 2026 4:00 PM - 5:00 PM - Join us for an ECSE Distinguished Mercer Lecture: “Spectrally Agile Cellular Wireless Systems” with Prof. Sundeep Rangan of NYU Tandon. Abstract and speaker bio can be found at the event URL.
item.author: Community

item.title: Math Colloquium: Dr. Yahong Yang from Georgia Tech
item.description: Date: Wednesday, February 25, 2026 11:00 AM - 12:00 PM - This Mathematical Sciences Colloquium will feature a presentation titled “Opportunities and Challenges of Neural Networks for Partial Differential Equations” by Dr. Yahong Yang. He is a Visiting Assistant Professor at Georgia Institute, and his research interests include machine learning theory, mathematical modeling in materials science and biology, and numerical methods for partial differential equations.
item.author: Community

item.title: Drop-In Tutoring
item.description: Did you know that the Student Success Center offers tutoring at three locations on campus this semester? The Success Center, ECAV, and our newest location Nason! Check out our Tutoring Schedule for more info: https://successcenter.rpi.edu/tutoring
item.author: Community

item.title: Department of Chemistry Seminar Series
item.description: Date: Tuesday, February 24, 2026 4:00 PM - 5:00 PM - Wayde Schmidt (RPI PhD ’87), CSO of a University of Connecticut startup company, will speak on Adventures in Materials Science & Engineering from a “Chemist’s” Perspective. Refreshments at 3:45 pm.
item.author: Community

item.title: Upcoming closures in Shuttle services
item.description: Friendly reminder that shuttles do not operate on holidays or during University closures. In observance of Spring Break (February 28–March 7), shuttles will not be running. Please plan accordingly.
item.author: Community

item.title: Webinar Friday February 27: RPI Digital Asset Management (DAM) System
item.description:
Join Jim Evans, Director of MultiMedia Services, on Friday February 27 from 11am to 12pm, for a live webinar introducing Rensselaer’s Digital Asset Management System. Discover how to access campus‑wide photography, multimedia files, and institutional assets—all in one place. Register now: https://rensselaer.webex.com/webappng/sites/rensselaer/webinar/webinarSeries/register/783d951c6ab8482e9198a7bd6075a700

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
item.author: Community
